document_name: PIP Support to the Abyei Civil Administration.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
1) Support to the construction of the civil administration offices provided (Gender Marker: 0)

2) Support to the development of a legal/regulatory and policy framework for governance provided (Gender Marker: 2) 

3) Technical Capacity of the civil administration strengthened (Gender Marker: 1) 

4) Project Coordination and Planning Support (Gender Marker: 0) 

5) Support to the establishment of the Joint Integrated Police Unit provided (Gender Marker: 1)

6) Community policing structures have been established and are operational (Gender Marker: 2) 

7) People's awareness of their rights is enhanced (Gender Marker: 2)

8) People have access to an operational legal aid system (Gender Marker: 2)

9) Capacity of rural courts and traditional leaders to provide justice is enhanced (Gender Marker: 2)
outputs.output_title: Support to the Abyei Civil Adm

project_descr: The Support to the Abyei Civil Administration Project
project_title: Support to the Abyei Civil Administration
